SA20n1326:5: evaṃ gotrasaṃpadamupādāya yathoktāyāṃ bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇānāṃ yathokteṣu ca bodhisattvaliṅgeṣu saṃdṛśyamānānāṃ bodhisattvapakṣyaprayogeṣu ca samyak prayuktānāṃ bodhisattvādhyāśayāñca yathoktāṃ viśodhayatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dvādaśabodhisattvavihārā bhavanti |
SA20n1326:7: trayodaśaśca tathāgato vihāro yo'sya bhavatyabhisaṃbodherniruttaro vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:18: iti yena [ca] bodhisattvastattvaṃ paśyati yañca tattvaṃ paśyati tasya ca tattvasyājñānād yathā pravṛttirduḥkhasya jñānācca punarapravṛttirduḥkhasya bhavati sattvānām |
SA20n1326:19: tadetadbodhisattvasya tribhirmukhaiḥ prajñayā vyavacārayataḥ trayoradhiprajñavihārā bhavanti |
SA20n1326:25: tāthāgataḥ punarvihāro yaḥ sarvabodhisattvavihārasamatikrāntasyābhisaṃbuddhabodhervihāraḥ tatra tathāgatasya paścimasya vihārasya pratiṣṭhāyogasthāne paścime sākalyena nirdeśo bhaviṣyati |
SA20n1326:26: dvādaśānāṃ punarbodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ yathā vyavasthānaṃ bhavati tathā nirdekṣāmi |
SA20n1326:29: iha bodhisattvo gotravihārī prakṛtibhadrasantānatayā prakṛtyā bodhisattvaguṇairbodhisattvārhaiḥ kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati |
SA20n1326:31: prakṛtibhadratayaiva na haṭhayogena tasmin kuśale pravarttate |
SA20n1326:32: api tu pratisaṃkhyānataḥ sāvagrahaḥ sambhṛto bhavati |
SA20n1326:33: sarveṣāṃ ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ gotravihārī bodhisattvo bījadharo bhavati |
SA20n1326:43: iha bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ cittotpādamupādāya aśuddhādhyāśayasya yā kācidbodhisattvacaryā ayamasyādhimukticaryāvihāra ityucyate |
SA20n1326:44: tatra gotravihārī bodhisattvastadanyeṣāṃ [sarveṣāṃ] bodhisattvavihārāṇāmekādaśānāṃ tāthāgatasya ca vihārasya hetumātre vartate hetu parigraheṇa |
SA20n1326:45: no tu tena kaścitu tadanyo bodhisattvavihāra ārabdho bhavati na pratilabdho na viśodhitaḥ |
SA20n1326:47: adhimukticaryāvihāriṇā punarbodhisattvena sarve bodhisattvavihārāstāthāgataśca vihāra ārabdhā bhavanti no tu pratilabdhā na viśodhitāḥ |
SA20n1326:54: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvatparamaḥ paraniṣpanno bodhisattvavihāro veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:55: parame pariniṣpanne bodhisattvavihāre pariśuddhe'nantaraṃ pūrvārabdhasya tātathāgatasya vihārasya sakṛtpratilambho viśuddhiśca veditavyā |
SA20n1326:64: yo laukikaṃ jñānaviśuddhisanniśrayabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ niśrṛtya satyāvabodhāya samyak smṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravicayavihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:68: yastameva satyāvabodha[madhi] patiṃ kṛtvā tadajñānāt sahetukaduḥkhapravṛti |
SA20n1326:70: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:71: yastameva trividhamapyadhiprajñavihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā'bhisaṃskāreṇābhogena niśchidranirantaraḥ sarvadharmeṣu tathatā-nirvikalpaprajñābhāvanā sahagato vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:72: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ anabhisaṃskāro'nābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:73: yastasyaiva pūrvakasya nirnimittasya vihārasya bhāvanā-bāhulyāt svarasenaiva niśchidranirantara- vāhirmārgānugato vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:75: yastameva supariśuddhaṃ niścalaṃ prajñāsamādhiṃ niśritya mahāmativaipulyamanuprāptasya pareṣāṃ dharmasamākhyānānuttaryamārabhya dharmāṇāṃ paryāyārtha-nirvacanaprabhedapravicayavihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:77: yatra sthito bodhisattvo bodhisattvamārganiṣṭhāgato'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mahādharmābhiṣekaprāpta ekajātipratibaddho vā bhavati caramabhaviko vā |
SA20n1326:78: yasya vihārasyānantaraṃ saṃhitamevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti |
SA20n1326:79: tatrādhimukticaryāvihāre [bodhisattvo] bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ parīttakārī bhavati cchidrakārī aniyatakārī punarlābhaparihāṇitaḥ |
SA20n1326:80: pramuditavihāre bodhisattvastasyāmeva bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ vipulakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī yathāpratilabdhāparihāṇitaḥ |
SA20n1326:82: pratharma nirnimittaṃ vihāramupādāya yāvatparamādbodhisattvavihārādbodhisattvo bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ apramāṇakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī ca |
SA20n1326:86: pratisaṃvidvihāre parame ca vihāre tasyā eva bodhisattva-nirnimitta-bhāvanāyāḥ phalapratyanubhāvanā veditavyā |
SA20n1326:87: adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṃgāni kāni nimittāni bhavanti |
SA20n1326:91: dṛḍhāyāḥ sthirāyāḥ avivartayā bodhisattvabhāvanāyāḥ alābhī bhavati |
SA20n1326:95: pratisaṃkhyāya ca sattvārtheṣu prayujyate na prakṛtyanukampā-prematayā |
SA20n1326:96: ekadā ca sattveṣu mithyāpi pratipadyate kāyena vācā manasā |
SA20n1326:100: no tu pratyātmaṃ tattvajño bhavati yaduta tathāgataṃ vā ārabhya dharmaṃ vā saṃghaṃ vā tattvārthaṃ vā buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā hetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā prāptavyaṃ vā'rthaṃ prāptyupāyaṃ vā gocaraṃ vā |
SA20n1326:101: parīttena ca śrutamayacintāmayena jñānena samanvāgato bhavati nāpramāṇena |
SA20n1326:104: duḥkhayā ca dhandhābhijñayā bodhisattva-pratipadā samanvāgato bhavati |
SA20n1326:120: sā cāsya haṭhena pravartitā na yathābhūtamājñāya |
SA20n1326:124: ekadā ca bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānān nivartate notsahate vā |
SA20n1326:125: ekadā sattvārthakriyāprayukto'pi khedamantarā kṛtvā tasmātsattvārthakriyāprayogāt pratinivartate |
SA20n1326:126: āśayataścātmanaḥ sukhakāmo bhavati pratisaṃkhyāya ca parasukhakāmaḥ |
SA20n1326:128: no tu parijñāya parijñāyāśeṣa-prahāṇavān punaḥ punaḥ skhalitādhyācāratayā |
SA20n1326:131: bhavati cāsya cetaso vikampitatvaṃ vimatiḥ sandehaśca |
SA20n1326:132: sarveṇa ca sarvaṃ mahākaruṇāsamudācāravivarjito bhavati sattveṣu |
SA20n1326:133: alpena ca hitasukhopasaṃhāreṇa sattveṣu pratyupasthito bhavati |
SA20n1326:134: na vipulena nāprameyeṇa ca sarvāsu paripūrṇāsu yathānirdiṣṭāsu bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate |
SA20n1326:136: na ca sarveṣu yathānirdiṣṭeṣu bodhipakṣaprayogeṣu paripūrṇeṣu saṃdṛśyate |
SA20n1326:138: na ca tathā nirvāṇe'syādhyāśayaḥ sanniviṣṭo bhavati yathā saṃsārasaṃsṛtau |
SA20n1326:140: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni liṅgāni nimittānīme ākārā adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1326:141: adhimukticaryāvihāre mṛddhyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāṃ yathā nirdiṣṭānāmākāraliṅga-nimittānāmadhimātratā veditavyā |
SA20n1326:143: adhimātrāyāṃ kṣāntau vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāṃ mṛdutā tanutvaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1326:144: adhimātrāyāmeva kṣāntau vartamānasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāmaśeṣaprahāṇāmanantarañca pramuditavihārapraveśo bodhisattvasya veditavyaḥ pratilambhayogena |
SA20n1326:145: tasyāsya pramuditavihāravihāriṇa ete [sarva] dharmāḥ sarvena sarvaṃ na bhavanti ye'dhimukticaryāvihāra-vihāriṇa ākhyātāḥ |
SA20n1326:146: etadviparyayeṇa ca sarve śuklapakṣyā dharmāḥ saṃvidyante |
SA20n1326:152: pramuditavihārasthitasya tu bodhisattvasya sarveṣāmeṣāmadhimokṣopakleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirūpakleśaḥ śuddho'dhimokṣaḥ pravartate |
SA20n1326:153: tatrapramuditavihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittāni veditavyāni |
SA20n1326:154: iha bodhisattvo'dhimukticaryāvihārāt pramuditavihāramanupraveśana-pūrvakañca bodhisattvapraṇidhānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau asupratividdhabodhya supratividdhabodhyupāyaṃ yadbhūyasā parapratyayagāsuniścitaṃ prahāyānyadabhinavaṃ ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ su [vi] niścitaṃ pratyātmaṃ bhāvānāmayaṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhānamutpādayati |
SA20n1326:158: ekakṣaṇa [mātraṃ] samutpanne api tasmin praṇidhāne dharmaprakṛtiḥ sā tādṛśī yā'prameyaśulkadharmeṣṭaphalā bhavati bodhisattvānām |
SA20n1326:160: nāsya pratilabdhasya kenacitparyāyeṇa parihāṇiranyathābhāvo vā upalabhyate |
SA20n1326:171: tatrādhimukticaryāvihāriṇāṃ sarvākārasūpacitakuśalamūlānāṃ samāsataḥ samyagbodhisattvacaryāniryātānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ taccittamutpadyate |
SA20n1326:172: āyatyāṃ samyagāśu sarvabodhisambhāraparipūriṃ sarvabodhisattva-sattvārthakriyāparipūrimanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhi sarvākāra-sarvabuddhadharmaparipūriṃ buddhakāryakriyāparipūriṃ ca samāsataḥ ālambanīkṛtya tadbodhisattvānāñcittamutpadyate |
SA20n1326:173: samyagāśu ca sarvākārasarvabodhisaṃbhārānukūlaṃ sarvasattveṣu sarvākārabodhisattvakṛtyānukūlamanuttara-samyaksaṃbodhisvayaṃbhūjñānapratilambhānukūlaṃ sarvākārabuddhakṛtyakaraṇānukūlaṃ taccittamutpadyate |
SA20n1326:180: asaṃrambhāvihiṃsākrodhabahulaḥ pareṣāṃ sarvākārāṃ bodhisattva-sattvārthakriyāṃ sarvākārāṃ bodhisaṃbhāraparipūriṃ sarvākārāṃ bodhiṃ buddhadharmāṃśca buddhakṛtyānuṣṭhānaṃ ca śuddhenādhyāśayenālambanīkurvan adhimucyamāno'vataran etaddharmāśu-samudāgamo'nukūlatāñcātmanaḥ sampaśyan pratyavagacchan prāmodyabahulo bhavati |
SA20n1326:181: kuśalenodāreṇa naiṣkramyopasaṃhitena nirāmiṣeṇāpratisamena kāyacittānugrāhakeṇa prāmodyena uttaptairacalairasmi kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ |
SA20n1326:186: tathā hyasya su[vi] niścitotpāditacittasya bodhisattvasya pañca bhayāni prahīṇāni bhavanti |
SA20n1326:188: kutaḥ punarasya ātma [sneho] vā upakaraṇasneho vā bhaviṣyati |
SA20n1326:196: maraṇāt me ūrdhvamāyatyāṃ niyataṃ buddhabodhisattvaiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti evaṃ niścito bhavati |
SA20n1326:201: sa evaṃ sarva bhayāpagataḥ sarvagambhīṃranirdeśatrāsāpagataḥ sarvocchrayamānastaṃbhāpagataḥ sarvaparāpakāravipratipattiṣu dveṣāpagataḥ sarvalokāmiṣa harṣāpagataḥ akliṣṭatvādanupahatena uttaptatvādaprakṛtenāśayena sarvakuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvākāraṃ bodhisattvavīryamārabhate śraddhādhipateyaṃ pūrvaṅgamāṃ kṛtvā |
SA20n1326:202: āyatyāñca yāni tāni pūrvanirdiṣṭāni bodhipakṣyapaṭale daśamahāpraṇidhānāni tānyasmin pramuditavihāre'bhinirhṛtyāśaya-śuddhitāmupādāya agrayasattvadakṣiṇīyaśāstṛdharmasvāmipūjāyai mahāpraṇidhānaṃ tatpraṇīta-[sad]-dharmasandhāraṇāya dvitīyamanupūrvasaddharmapravartanāya tṛtīyaṃ tadanukūla-bodhisattvacaryācaraṇatāyai caturthaṃ tadbhājanasattvaparipācanatāyai pañcamaṃ buddhakṣetreṣūpasaṃkramya tathāgatadarśanaparyupāsanasaddharmaśravaṇatāyai ṣaṣṭhaṃ svabuddhakṣetra-pariśodhanatāyai saptamaṃ sarvajātiṣu buddhabodhisattvāvirahitatāyai bodhisattvaiśca sahaikāśayaprayogitāyai aṣṭamaṃ sarvasattvārthakriyāmoghatāyai navamamanuttarasamyaksambodhyabhisaṃbudhyanatāyai buddhakṛtyakaraṇatāyai ca daśamaṃ mahāpraṇidhānabhinirharati pāramparyeṇa ca sattvadhātvanupacchedavallokadharmānupacchedavadeṣāmeva [me] mahāpraṇidhānānāṃ janmani janmani yavadbodhiparyantagamanādavigamaścāsaṃpramoṣaścāvisayogaśca syāditi samyak cittaṃ praṇidadhāti |
SA20n1326:203: pūrvakaṃ praṇidhātavye'rthe praṇidhānaṃ paścimakaṃ praṇidhānaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1326:204: etānyeva ca mahāpraṇidhānāni pramukhāni kṛtvā tasya bodhisattvasya daśapraṇidhānāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyutpadyante samyak praṇidhānānām |
SA20n1326:205: tasyaivamāyatyāñca praṇidhānavataḥ dṛṣṭe ca dharme ārabdhavīryasya daśavihārapariśodhanā dharmāḥ pramuditavihārapariśuddhaye saṃvartante |
SA20n1326:207: pratītyasamutpādayogena kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaskandhasamudāgamaṃ paśyataḥ karuṇā |
SA20n1326:208: mayaite sattvā asmātkevalād duḥkhaskandhādvimocayitavyā iti saṃpaśyato maitrī |
SA20n1326:218: yaduta śraddhā karuṇāmaitrītyāgaḥ akhedaḥ śāstrajñatā lokajñatā hrīvyapatrāpyatā dhṛtibalādhānatā tathāgatapūjopasthānatā ca |
SA20n1326:219: sa ca bodhisattva etāṃśca dharmāṃ samādāya vartate bahalīkaroti |
SA20n1326:220: tadanyeṣāñca navānāmadhiśīlādīnāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ sarvākāramārgaguṇadoṣān paryeṣate buddhabodhisattvānāmantikāt |
SA20n1326:223: yairākāraiḥ praveśati ta ākārāḥ yaḥ praveśaḥ sa pratilambhaḥ |
SA20n1326:224: praviṣṭasya yā [mahā] phalānuśaṃsaniṣpattiḥ samudāgamaśca sa niṣyando veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:225: tasyāsminvihāre vyavasthitasya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti audārikadarśanasya |
SA20n1326:226: ye ca tena śrutā bhavanti bodhisattvapaṭike |
SA20n1326:228: santi daśasu dikṣu nānā-nāmasu lokadhātuṣu nānā-nāmānastathāgatā iti |
SA20n1326:235: sa evamaudārikaprasādadarśanatayā praṇidhānabalādhānatayā ca tāṃstathāgatān dṛṣṭvā sarvākārāṃ pūjāṃ sukhopadhānatāmupasaṃharati yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ saṃghasammānanāṃ ca karoti |
SA20n1326:236: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāmantikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti udgṛhaṇāti dhārayati |
SA20n1326:238: tāni ca sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni mahābodhau pariṇāmayati |
SA20n1326:240: tasyaibhistribhirviśuddhikāraṇaistāni kuśalamūlāni [yad] bhūyasyā mātrāyā viśudhyanti tathāgatadharmasaṃghapūjā-parigraha [ṇa] tayā saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sattvaparipācanatayā kuśalamūlānāṃ bodhipariṇamanatayā ca yāvadanekāni kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi |
SA20n1326:241: tadyathā suvarṇaṃ prakṛtisthitaṃ yathā yathāgnau prakṣipyate dakṣeṇa karmāreṇa tathā tathā viśuddhataratāṃ gacchati |
SA20n1326:242: evamevāsyāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni taiviṃśuddhikāraṇairviśuddhitaratāṃ gacchanti |
SA20n1326:243: tatrasthaścāsāvupapattito yadbhūyasā cakravartī bhavati janmani janmani jambudvīpeśvaraḥ |
SA20n1326:245: yacca kiñciccaturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ karmārabhyate tatsarvamavirahitaṃ ratnasarvākārabodhisamudāgama-manaskāraiḥ |
SA20n1326:247: ākāṃkṣamāṇaśca tadrūpaṃ vīryamārabhate yatsarvagṛhakalatrabhogānutsṛjya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitvā ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena śataṃ bodhisattvasamādhīnāṃ samāpadyate |
SA20n1326:258: kāyañca kāyaṃ bodhisattvaśataparivāramādarśayati ataḥparaṃ praṇidhānabalenāpramāṇā prabhāvavikurvaṇā bodhisattvānāṃ veditavyā asmin pramuditavihāre sthitānām |
SA20n1326:260: teṣāṃ samyak praṇidhānāṃ na sukarāṃ saṃkhyā kartu yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi |
SA20n1326:261: evamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pramuditavihāraḥ suviniścita[taḥ] caturākāraḥ cittotpādataḥ samyak praṇidhānavīryārambhābhinirhārataḥ vihārapariśodhanatastadanyavihāravyutpattitaḥ kuśalamūlapariśodhanataḥ upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:263: yāśca daśabhūmike sūtre daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ ta iha bodhisattvapiṭake mātṛkānirdeśa-daśa-bodhisattvavihārā yathākramaṃ pramuditavihāramupādāya yāvatparamavihārādveditavyāḥ |
SA20n1326:266: tatra katame bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlavihārasya ākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittani veditavyāni |
SA20n1326:267: iha bodhisattvena pūrvameva pramuditavihāre daśākāreṇa cittāśayenāśayaśuddhiḥ pratilabdhā bhavati |
SA20n1326:282: daśasu ca paripūrṇeṣu [kuśaleṣu] karmapatheṣu prakṛtyā saṃdṛśyate |
SA20n1326:283: sa evaṃ prakṛtiśīlī prajñayā kliṣṭākliṣṭānāṃ karmapathānāṃ durgatisugatiyāneṣu karmasamudācāre hetuphalasamudāgamavyavasthānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1326:284: vipākaniṣyandaphala [ta] śca tāni karmāṇi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1326:286: parāṃśca tatraiva samādāpayitukāmo bhavati samādāpayati ca viṣamakarmasamācāradoṣaduṣṭañca sattvadhātuṃ sarvamaviśeṣeṇa sampattivipattigataṃ paramārthato duḥkhitaṃ vyasanasthaṃ vicitrairvyasanākārairanukampamāno'nukampāvaipulyamanuprāptaḥ pratyavekṣate |
SA20n1326:287: tasyāsmin adhiśīlavihāre vyavasthitasya buddhadarśanaṃ kuśalamūlaviśuddhiḥ pūrvavadveditavyā |
SA20n1326:289: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa kāsīsaṃ grakṣiptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā viśuddhataraṃ bhavatyagnau prakṣipyamāṇam |
SA20n1326:291: asmiṃśca vihāre śuddhacittāśayaniṣpattipraveśata upapatti [ta] ścāturdvīpakaścakravartī bhavati |
SA20n1326:292: yadbhūyasā bāhulyena ca dauḥśīlyādakuśalebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ sattvān vyāvartayati |
SA20n1326:296: prakṛtiśīlataśca sarvākāradauḥśīlyamalāpakarṣataśca sarvakarmapathasarvākārahetuphalajñānaprativedhataśca śubhe karmaṇī parasamādāpanakāmaścānukampā vaipulyapratilambhataśca sattvadhātukarmajaduḥkhavyasanālocanataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaśca upapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:297: vistaranirdeśataḥ punaryathā sūtrameva yathā daśabhūmike vimalāyāṃ bhūmau dauḥśīlyamalāpagatatvāt vimalā bhūmirityucyate |
SA20n1326:299: yā tatra vimalā bhūmiḥ sehādhiśīlavihāro veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:300: tatra katame bodhisattvānāmākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittāni adhicittavihārasya |
SA20n1326:301: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhiśīlavihāre te daśa śuddhāśayā manasikṛtā bhavanti juṣṭāḥ pratividdhāḥ |
SA20n1326:305: sarvāsravasāsraveṣu me dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandati pratikūlatāyāṃ ca santiṣṭhata iti manasikāreṇa |
SA20n1326:306: tatpratipakṣabhāvanāyāṃ ca me vijñānaṃ saṃsthitamiti manasikāreṇa |
SA20n1326:309: asaṃlīnaṃ ca me mānasaṃ pravartate sarvabuddhadharmeṣviti manasikāreṇa |
SA20n1326:310: sarvaduṣkaracaryāsu ca me nāsti vyatheti manasikāreṇa |
SA20n1326:311: adhimuktaṃ ca me mahāyāne cittamekāntena na tadanyahīnayāneṣviti manasikāreṇa |
SA20n1326:317: tatra ca spṛhājāto bhavati ghanarasena cchandena |
SA20n1326:324: tasya ca vimokṣasya samudāgamāya dharmadhātau sarvavikalpapracāra-saṃlkeśotpattipratipakṣaṃ prajñāṃ paśyati |
SA20n1326:325: tasya ca jñānālokasya niṣpattaye samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paśyati |
SA20n1326:328: saddharmaśravaṇahetornāsti taddraviṇaṃ pariṣkāramādhyātmika-vāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajati |
SA20n1326:332: sa prītataro bhavatyeka catuṣpadagāthāśravaṇena na tvevaṃ trisāhasrapūrṇapratimena mahāratnarāśinā |
SA20n1326:333: prītataro bhavatyekadharmapadaśravaṇena samyaksaṃbuddhopanītena bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakena na sarvaśakratva [-māratva-] brahmatva-lokapālatva-cakravartitva-samucchrayapratilambhaiḥ |
SA20n1326:335: evamahamidaṃ [dharmapadaṃ] samyaksaṃbuddhopanītaṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakaṃ te'nuśrāvayiṣyāmi sa cenmahatyāmagnikhadāyāmātmānaṃ prakṣipasi mahāntañca duḥkhopakramaṃ saṃpratīcchasīti |
SA20n1326:337: utsahāmyahamasya dharmapadasyārthe pūrvavat trisāhasramahāsāhasrapratimāyāmāpyagnikhadāyāṃ brahmalokādātmānamutsraṣṭuṃ prāgeva pratyavarāyām |
SA20n1326:339: evaṃrūpeṇa vīryārambheṇa dharmān paryeṣyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti |
SA20n1326:340: yathā dharmānnudharmapratipattiṃ buddhadharmānugatāṃ na vyañjanasvaramātraviśaddhimiti viditvā tadeva śrutaṃ niśritya dharmanimittāni samyagālambanīkurvan viviktaṃ kāmairvistareṇa prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthañca dhyānaṃ laukikaṃ catasra ārūpyasamāpattīrlaukikīścatvāryapramāṇāni pañca cābhijñā upasaṃpadya viharati |
SA20n1326:341: sa tairbahulaṃ vihṛtya tāni dhyānāni samādhīn samāpattīḥ vyāvartayitvā praṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātau yatra sattvārthaṃ bodhipakṣadharmaparipūriṃ ca paśyati tatropapadyate |
SA20n1326:343: tasya kāmavītarāgatvātkāmabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti dhyānasamādhisamāpattivyāvartanatvād bhavabandhanāni |
SA20n1326:344: adhimukticaryā-bhūmāvevāsya pūrvameva dharmatathatādhimokṣād dṛṣṭikṛtabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti |
SA20n1326:348: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇakuśalasya karmārasya hastagataṃ prakṣīṇamalakaṣāyamapi samadharaṇamavatiṣṭhate tulyamānam |
SA20n1326:352: prabhāve'pi yatra pūrvake vihāre sahasramākhyātaṃ tatreha śatasahasraṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1326:353: ayaṃ bodhisattvānāmadhicittavihāraścittamanaskāra-pariniṣpa [tti-] praveśataśca saṃsārasattvadhātumahābodhisamyak-prativedha [ta] śca sattvaduḥkhavimokṣopāya-samyak-paryeṣaṇataśca mahāgauravadharmaparyeṣaṇataśca dharmānudharmapratipatti-laukikadhyānasamādhisamāpattyabhijñābhinirhāra-vihārataśca tadvyāvartanaṃ praṇidhāya yatra kāmopapattitaśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:354: vistaranirdeśaḥ punaryathāsūtraṃ tadyathā daśabhūmike prabhākaryāṃ bhūmau |
SA20n1326:356: adhyātmaṃ cittaviśuddhimupādāya sā prabhā saṃbhavati tasmātsa vihāraḥ adhicitta ityucyate |
SA20n1326:359: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhicittavihāre daśa dharmālokapraveśāḥ śrutaparyeṣṭimadhipattiṃ kṛtvā pratilabdhā bhavanti |
SA20n1326:361: [te] punardaśa dharmālokapraveśā granthato yathā sūtrameva veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:362: ye ca prajñapyante yatra ca prajñapyante yena ca prajñapyante te ca yatsamāḥ paramārthaḥ yasya ca saṃkleśa-vyavadānaśca saṃkliśyante viśuddhante ca yatpratiyusaṃktena saṃkleśena saṃkliśyante yayā cānuttarayā viśuddhyā viśudhyante |
SA20n1326:365: abhedyāśayatā pūrvaṅgamairyathāsūtrameva daśākāreṇa jñānaparipākena [jñāna-] paripācakairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati tathāgatakule tadātmaka-dharmapratilambhāt |
SA20n1326:366: sarvākārāṃ bodhisattvāpekṣāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā smṛtyupasthānapramukhān saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayanti yathāsūtrameva |
SA20n1326:367: tasya tāndharmānupāyaparigraheṇa bhāvayataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ susūkṣmāpyasya skandhadhātvāyatanānyabhiniveśaḥ sarveñjitāni cātyantāsamudācārataḥ prahīyante |
SA20n1326:368: teṣāṃ prahāṇād yāni tathāgata-vivarṇitāni karmāṇi tāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ nādhyācarati |
SA20n1326:370: tathābhūtaśca bhūyasā mātrayā snigdhamṛdukarmaṇyacittaśca bhavati tathā citrākārasuviśuddhacittaśca |
SA20n1326:372: uttari ca bhūmipariśodhakāni karmāṇi samanveṣamāṇo mahāvīryārambhaprāpto bhavati |
SA20n1326:385: prabhāve ca yatra pūrvavihāre śatasahasraguṇaṃ samākhyātaṃ tatrāsmin koṭisamākhyātaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1326:387: dharmālokapraveśaniṣpattiṃ pratilābhataśca jñānaparipācanataśca bodhipakṣyadharmaniṣevaṇataśca satkāyadṛṣṭyādi-sarvābhiniveśeñjitaprahāṇataśca pratiṣiddhānujñātakarmavivarjana-niṣevaṇataśca tannidānaṃ cittamārdavataśca tadanu-kūlaguṇasamṛddhitaśca bhūmipariśodhaka-karmaparyeṣṭimārabhya mahāvīryārambhataśca tannidānamāśayādhyāśayādhimuktiviśodhanataśca tannidānaṃ sarvaśāsanapratyarthikāsaṃhāryataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:388: vistaranirdeśaḥ punastadyathādaśabhūmike'rciṣmatī bhūminirdeśe bodhipakṣyā dharmāstasyāṃ bhūmau jñānārcibhūtāḥ samyagdharmadeśanā prajñāvabhāsakarakālokānām |
SA20n1326:392: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvake'dhiprajñavihāre [yā] daśa viśuddhāśayasamatāḥ pratilabdhāḥ tāsāmadhimātrātvāt paripūrṇatvāt dvitīyamadhiprajñavihāraṃ praviśati |
SA20n1326:399: bhūyo jñānavaiśeṣikatāṃ prārthayamānaḥ catvāryasatyāni daśabhirākārairyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1326:403: pratyupannaduḥkhātmakatāṃ hetu[ta-] ścānāgataduḥkhaprabhāvatāṃ hetukṣayāt [tat-] kṣayānutpāda [na] tāṃ tatprahāṇopāyaniṣevaṇatāṃ cārabhya yathā deśyate |
SA20n1326:405: sa evaṃ satyakuśalaḥ sarvañca saṃskāragataṃ prajñayā samyag vidūṣayati |
SA20n1326:413: yāni ca sattvānugrāhakāni laukikāni lipiśāstramudrāgaṇanādīni yathāsūtrameva śilpakarmaṃsthānāni tāni sarvāṇyābhinirharati sattvakaruṇa [ta] yā |
SA20n1326:414: anupūrveṇa yāvat bodhipratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ laukikavyavahārānukūlatayā dāridrya-nāśopāyatayā dhātuvaiṣamyamanuṣyāmanuṣyopasaṃhṛtopadravapraśamanatayā'navadyakrīḍārativastūpasaṃhārato dharmarativyāvartanatayā sannivāsopakaraṇārthināmalpakṛcchreṇa sannivāsopakaraṇopasaṃharaṇatayā rājacaurādyupadravaparitrāṇatayā sthānāsthānaprayogānujñāpratiṣedhanatayā maṅgalyāmaṅgalyavastvādānatyāgasanniyojanatayā dṛṣṭe dharme parasparānabhidrohasamparāyāviparītābhyudayamārgopadeśanatayā |
SA20n1326:415: ityayaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānugrāhakānāṃ śilpakarmasthānānāṃ samāsārtho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:418: tadyathā tadeva svarṇakuśalena karmakāreṇa musāragalva-mṛṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamatulyatayā'saṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyaiḥ suvarṇaiḥ |
SA20n1326:419: evamayaṃ bodhisattvo'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tadanyabhūmisthitaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ |
SA20n1326:420: tadyathā candrasūryanakṣatrāṇāmābhā asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sarva vātamaṇḍalaiḥ |
SA20n1326:422: evamevāsya bodhisattvasya sā prajñā asaṃhāryā bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ |
SA20n1326:428: śuddhāśayasamatā-niṣpatti-praveśataśca upāyasatyavyavacāraṇā-prativivardhanataśca sarvasaṃskāravidūṣaṇataśca kārūṇyavivardhanataśca tadarthaṃ puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayapraṇidhānaprayogataśca smṛtimatigatyādiguṇavivṛddhitaścānanyamanasikāra-sarvākāra-sattvaparipācanābhiyogataśca laukikaśilpābhinirhārataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:429: vistaranirdeśataḥ punastadyathā daśabhūmike sudurjayāyāṃ bhūmau sattveṣu niścayajñānaṃ sudurjayam |
SA20n1326:434: iha bodhisattvena pūrvameva satyapratisaṃyukte adhiprajñavihāre daśa dharmasamatāḥ pratilabdhaḥ bhavanti |
SA20n1326:437: sarvadharmeṣu pāramārthikasya sataḥ svabhāvasya nirnimittasamatayā abhilāpābhisaṃskārapratibhāsasyālakṣaṇasamatayā tasyaivālakṣaṇatvāt svayamajātasamatayā hetuto'nutpannasamatā svayaṃ hetu [ta] ścānuptannatvādatyantamādiśāntasamatayā vidyamāna [sya] vastugrāhakasya jñānasya niṣprapañcasamatayā ādānatyāgābhisaṃskāravigamasamatayā ca tasyaiva kleśaduḥkhasaṃkleśa-visaṃyogād viviktasamatayā vikalpitasya jñeyasvabhāvasya māyānirmitopamasamatayā nirvikalpajñānagocarasya svabhāvasya bhāvābhāvādvayasamatayā |
SA20n1326:439: so'sminvihāre sthitaḥ sattveṣu saṃvṛddhakaruṇo bodhau tīvracchandābhilāṣajātaḥ |
SA20n1326:440: lokānāṃ saṃbhavañca vibhavañca sarvākārayā pratītyasamutpāda-samyagvyavacāraṇatayā vyavacārayati prajānāti |
SA20n1326:443: sa evaṃ paramārthakuśalaḥ sattvasāpekṣaḥ yoniśaḥ pratividhyati kleśasaṃyogāt |
SA20n1326:444: pratyayasāmagryācca saṃskṛtaṃ prakṛtidurbalamātmātmīyavirahitamanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ pravartate na vinā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīm |
SA20n1326:445: tena mayā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīṃ ca vikalīkartavyā cātmarakṣārtham |
SA20n1326:446: na ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ sattvānugrahārtham |
SA20n1326:447: tasyaivaṃ jñānakārūṇyānugatasyāsmin vihāre'saṅgajñānābhimukho nāma prajñāpāramitāvihāraḥ abhisaṃmukhī bhavati |
SA20n1326:449: sa ca vihāro yā tīkṣṇā saptamyāṃ bhūmau prāyogikacaryāparyantagatā bodhisattvakṣāntiḥ tayānulomikyā kṣāntyā saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:459: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa vaidūryamaṇiratnamuṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyaiḥ sarvajātarūpaiḥ evamasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni viśuddhatarāṇi bhavantyasaṃhāryāṇi pūrvavat |
SA20n1326:460: tadyathā candraprabhā sattvāśrayāṃśca prahalādayatyanācchedyaprabhā ca bhavati catasṛbhirvātamaṇḍalikābhiḥ |
SA20n1326:461: evamasya bodhisattvasya sā prajñābhā sarvasattvakleśaparidāhañca praśamayati |
SA20n1326:467: dharmasamatā-pariniṣpattipraveśataśca pratītyasamutpādāvabodhavimokṣamukhasambhavataśca sarvamithyāsaṃjñāsamudācārataśca upāyasaṃsāraparigrahataśca asaṅgajñānābhimukha-prajñāpāramitāvihārābhimukhataśca apramāṇa-samādhipratilambhataśca abhedyāśayapratilambhataśca śāsanādāsaṃhāryataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:471: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:472: iha bodhisattvenānantare'dhiprajñavihāre daśopāyena prajñayā cābhinirhṛtāḥ sarvasattvāsādhāraṇā laukikāḥ sarvalokāsādhāraṇāśca mārgāntarārambhaviśeṣāḥ pratilabdhā bhavanti |
SA20n1326:475: laukikasampattisaṃvartakaṃ puṇyaparigraha mārabhya sattveṣu hitasukhāśayamārabhya bodhāya puṇyasambhārabodhipakṣya-dharmottarotkarṣamārabhya śrāvakāsādhāraṇatāmārabhya pratyekabuddhāsādhāraṇatāmārabhya sattvadharmadhātumārabhya lokadhātumārabhya tathāgatakāyavākcittajñānamāramya |
SA20n1326:478: tatsamutathā nāya cānābhoganirnimittākalpāvikalpanatayā'pramāṇabuddhiviṣaya-samutthānaṃ paśyan nirantaraṃ niścchidraṃ prayujyate sarveryāpatha-cāravihāramanasikāreṣu |
SA20n1326:480: tasya cittakṣaṇe daśapāramitāḥ pramukhāḥ sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ paripūryante viśeṣeṇa |
SA20n1326:482: prathame pramuditavihāre praṇidhānādhyālambanatayā dvitīye cittadauḥśīlyamalāpakarṣaṇatayā tṛtīye praṇidhānavivardhanadharmālokapratilābhatayā caturthe mārgāvatāraṇatayā pañcabhe laukikakriyāvatāraṇa yā ṣaṣṭhe gambhīrapraveśanatayā |
SA20n1326:483: āsmin punaḥ saptame vihāre sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā bodhaṅgāni paripūryante bodhisattvaprāyogikacaryāparipūrisaṃgrahādasya vihārasya jñānābhijñācaryāviśuddhāṣṭamavihārākramaṇācca |
SA20n1326:484: tathā hi sa bodhisattvo'sya vihārasyānantaramaṣṭamaṃ viśuddhaṃ vihāraṃ praviśati |
SA20n1326:489: tasmādasmin vihāre sarve rāgādipramukhāḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante |
SA20n1326:490: sa ca na saṃkleśo na niḥkleśo veditavyaḥ asamudācārād buddhajñānābhilāṣācca |
SA20n1326:492: sa yāni tathāgatavivarṇitāni karmāṇi pūrvavat tasya pañcamavihārābhinihṛtāni laukikāni śilpajñānānīha paripūryante ācāryasammataśca bhavati trisāhasramahāsāhasre sthāpayitvā ūrdhvavihārasthān bodhisattvāṃstathāgatāṃśca |
SA20n1326:494: sarve ca dhyānādayo bodhipakṣyā dharmā āmukhī bhavanti |
SA20n1326:499: sa tathā prayuktaḥ suniścitaviṣayasamādhipramukhāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇyabhinirharati bodhisattvasamādhīnām |
SA20n1326:501: sa evaṃ sarvakleśaviviktena durvijñeyena sarvavikalpapracārāpagatena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā viharati |
SA20n1326:504: asminvihāre svabuddhiviṣayatayā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaviṣayasamatikrāntāstadanyeṣu tu ṣaṭṣu buddhadharmādhyālambanatayā ṣaṣṭhe ca vihāre bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate |
SA20n1326:507: yad bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati na ca nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti |
SA20n1326:508: sa tamevopāyajñānābhinihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvāsādhāraṇāṃ bodhisattvacaryāñcarati laukikapratibhāsāñcātanmayīṃ ca yathāsūtrameva |
SA20n1326:510: puṇyakriyāmārabhya kaḍatrapariṣatparigrahamabhinirvṛttiviśeṣaprārthanā-samārambhaṃ vimokṣatrayavihāratāṃ hīnayānādhimuktopāyavinayanatāṃ kāmaparibhogaṃ kāmaviśeṣaprārthanāṃ tīrthikavyāvartanatāṃ paracittānuvartanatāṃ mahājanakāyānuvartanatāṃ cārabhya śeṣaṃ pūrvavat |
SA20n1326:512: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa sarvamaṇiratnamṛṣṭuṃ pratyarpitamatyarthaṃ bhrājate |
SA20n1326:515: tadyathā sūryābhā jambūdvīpe yadbhūyasā snehaśca pariśoṣayati |
SA20n1326:516: asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sa ca tadanyaprabhābhiḥ |
SA20n1326:517: evamasya bodhisattvasya prajñābhā sattvānāṃ sarvakleśaviṣāṇi ca śoṣayati |
SA20n1326:522: ayaṃ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ upāyaprajñābhinihṛtamārgāntarārambhaviśeṣaniṣpattipraveśataśca tathāgataviṣayasamutthāna-prativedha-nirantaraprayogataśca pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvabodhipakṣyadharmasamudāgamataśca kliṣṭākliṣṭa-vyavasthānataśca prayogikacaryāparipūrisaṃgrahataśca āśayaśuddhikarmapravṛttim adhikṛtya sarvalaukikaśilpakarmādiparipūraṇataśca aprameyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāsādhāraṇasamādhi-pratilambhataśca pratikṣaṇanirodhasamāpattitaśca sarvasattvāsādhāraṇalokacaryācaraṇataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaśca upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsa-nirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:527: tatra katamo bodhisattvānām anābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:528: iha bodhisattvena prathame'nantare vihāre daśākāraṃ sarvadharmaparamārthāvatārajñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1326:529: triṣu adhveṣu yathāyogam ādyanutpannatāmajanmatāmalakṣaṇatām ārabhya tadanyahetubhāvāsambhavāvināśatāñcārabhya paramārthato nirabhilāpyasvabhāve vastunyabhilāpābhisaṃskārapratibhāsasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇena hetubhāvena cāvidyamānasya tasyaiva saṃkleśātmanāpravṛttitāñcānivṛttitāñcārabhya tadajñānamithyābhiniveśahetukāñca tasminvidyamāne vastuni nirabhilāpye ādau madhye paryavasāne sarvakālasaṃkleśasamatāṃ cārabhya tathatā-samyakpraveśanirvikalpasamatayā ca tatsaṃkleśāpanayanamārabhya |
SA20n1326:531: ihasthaścānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu paramāṃ bodhisattvakṣāntiṃ suviśuddhāṃ labhate |
SA20n1326:533: catasṛbhiḥ paryeṣaṇābhirayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadhamān paryeṣya yadā caturbhireva yathābhūtaparijñānaiḥ parijānāti |
SA20n1326:534: tadā sarvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśeṣvapanīteṣu sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvasaṃlkeśānutpattyanukūlatāṃ paśyati |
SA20n1326:535: samparāye ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ niravaśeṣato'nutpatiṃ paśyati teṣāmeva pūrvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśahetusamutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām |
SA20n1326:536: tāḥ punaḥ catasraḥ paryeṣaṇā yathāpūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭāstattvārthapaṭale |
SA20n1326:537: catvāri ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni tānyadhimukticaryāvihāramupādāya yāvatsābhoganirnirmittādvihārān na suviśuddhāni bhavanti |
SA20n1326:539: tasmāt sa bodhisattvaḥ anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣānti-pratilabdha ityucyate |
SA20n1326:540: sa tasyāḥ kṣānterlābhād gambhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāramanuprāpto bhavati |
SA20n1326:541: tasya ye pūrvake nirnimitte vihāre catvāro'pakṣālāste prahīṇā bhavanti |
SA20n1326:543: uttari ca viśuddhavihāre autsukyaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1326:547: tasya ca tasmin gambhīre vihāre'bhiratasya tasmin dharmamukhasrotasi tathāgata-saṃcodanā-samādāpanā-abhinirhāramukha-jñānābhijñā-karmopasaṃhāro'prameyaḥ |
SA20n1326:548: tathā saṃcoditasya cāpramāṇakāyavibhaktijñānābhinirhāro daśavaśitā-prāptiśca yathāsūtrameva vistareṇa veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1326:553: sarvopapattisaṃvartanīyeṣu ca karmasu sarvopapattyāyataneṣu cāsya kāmakāmopapattitā bhavati |
SA20n1326:556: yad yadeva vastu yathādhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati nānyathā |
SA20n1326:557: yañca jñeyaṃ jñātukāmo bhavati tadapi jānīte yathāvat |
SA20n1326:560: evaṃ vaśitāprāptasya bodhisattvasyātaḥ pareṇa vaśitāprāptakṛto'nuśaṃso vistareṇa yathāsūtrameva veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:561: audārikañca buddhadarśanaṃ vihāya satatasamitamavirahito bhavati buddhadarśanena |
SA20n1326:566: paramārthavatārajñānaniṣpattipraveśataśca anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhataśca sarvāpakṣālāpagata-gambhīra-bodhisattvavihāraprāptitaśca dharmamukhasrotasi buddhairaprameyābhinirhāramukhajñānābhijñākarmopasaṃhārataśca apramāṇakāyavibhaktijñānapraveśataśca vaśitāprāptitaśca vaśitānuśaṃsapratyanubhavanataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattiḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:572: iha bodhisattvastenāpi vihāreṇa gambhīreṇāsaṃtuṣṭa uttarijñānaviśeṣatāmanugacchan yaiśca dharmajñānābhisaṃskāraiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaḥ sarvākāro bodhisattvena deśayitavyo yacca dharmākhyānakṛtyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tatredaṃ dharmasamākhyānakṛtyam |
SA20n1326:573: gahanopavicāreṣu ye ca saṃkliśyante viśudhyante ca |
SA20n1326:574: yena ca saṃkliśyante yena ca viśudhyante |
SA20n1326:580: evañca dharma-deśanākuśalasya deśanākṛtyakuśalasya ca yat sarvākāramahādharma-bhāṇakatvam aprameyadhāraṇīprāptasya sarvasvarāṅgavibhaktikuśalasyākṣayapratibhānasya |
SA20n1326:584: yatra yeṣu ca dharma deśayataḥ yāvadbhirmukhaiḥ yayā sattva-vijñāpana santoṣaṇa-kṛtyasaṃniyojana-śaktyā samanvāgatasya |
SA20n1326:587: ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pratisaṃvidvihāraḥ śāntavimokṣasantuṣṭipraveśataśca dharmasamākhyānābhisaṃskārajñānataśca tatkṛtyajñānataśca acintyamahādharmabhāṇakatvapratilambhataścakaśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:590: sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāśayapariśuddhyā bodhisattvapratisaṃvinmatyā dharmasamākhyānādhikāratvāt sā bhūmiḥ sādhumatītyucyate |
SA20n1326:593: iha bodhisattvasya pratisaṃvid-vihāre sarvākārapariśuddhe dharmarājatvārhasya dharmābhiṣekasamāsannasya vimalādisamādhi-aprameyapratilambha-tatkṛtyakaraṇataḥ sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣeka paścimasādhisammukhībhāvācca sarvabuddhebhyasyadanurūpāsanakāyaparivārapratilābhinaḥ svaraśmigamanapratyāgamanaiḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānābhiṣekapratilambhataśca abhiṣiktasya ca sarvavineya-samudānayana-tadvimokṣopāya-buddhakṛtyajñānataśca aprameya-vimokṣa-dhāraṇī abhijñā pratilambhataśca tadādhipateya mahāsmṛtijñā nābhinirhāranirvacanavyavasthānataśca mahābhijñābhinirhārataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhi-upapattiprabhāvaviśeṣataśca samāsanirdeśataḥ paramo vihāro veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:595: paripūrṇabodhisattvamārgaḥ suparipūrṇa-bodhisambhāraśca sa bodhisattvaḥ tathāgatā nāmantikāt dharmamedhabhūmyāmatyudārāṃ duḥsahāḥ tadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ saddharmaṃvṛṣṭi sampratīcchati |
SA20n1326:596: mahāmedhabhūtaśca svayamanabhisambuddhabodhi-abhisambuddhabodhiścāprameyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saddharma-vṛṣṭayā nirapamayā kleśarajāṃsi praśamayati |
SA20n1326:597: vicitrāṇi ca kuśalamulaśasyāni virohayati vivardhayatī pācayatī tasyāṃ bhūmāvavasthitaḥ |
SA20n1326:600: na ca yānyuttarottareṣu vihāreṣvaṅgāni nirniṣṭāni tāni pūrvakeṣu vihāreṣu sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante |
SA20n1326:601: api tu mṛdutvān na saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti |
SA20n1326:603: ekaikaścātra vihāro'nekairmahākalpakoṭīśatasahasraistato vā prabhūtataraiḥ pratilabhyate niṣpadyate ca |
SA20n1326:604: te tu sarve vihārāstribhirmahākalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ samudāgacchanti mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenādhimukticaryā-vihāraṃ samatikramya pramuditavihāro labhyate |
SA20n1326:606: dvitīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyena pramuditavihāraṃ yāvatsābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ vihāramatikramyānābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1326:608: tathā hi sa śuddhāśayo bodhisattvo niyataṃ vyāyacchate |
SA20n1326:609: tṛtīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenānābhogañca nirnimittaṃ pratisaṃvidvihārañca samatikramya paramaṃ bodhisattvavihāraṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1326:611: yo'pi mahākalpaḥ so'pi rātrindivasamāsārdhamāsagaṇanāyogena kālāprameyatvādasaṃkhyeya ityucyate |
SA20n1326:612: yāpi teṣāmeva mahākalpānāṃ gaṇanāyogena sarvagaṇanā samatikrāntā saṃkhyā so'pyasaṃkhyeyaḥ |
SA20n1326:615: yastvadhimātrādhimātreṇa vīryārambheṇa prayujyate tataḥ kaścidantarakalpān prabhūtān vyāvartayati kaścit yāvanmahākalpān |
SA20n1326:618: tatra triṣu vihāreṣu kleśāvaraṇapakṣyadauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1326:619: pramudite [vihāre] āpāyikakleśapakṣyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ samudācāratastvadhimātramamyasya sarvakleśapakṣyasya anābhoge nirnimitte vihāre'nutpattikadharmakṣānti-viśuddhivibandhakleśa pakṣyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ dauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1326:622: tacca tathāgataṃ vihāramanupraviśataḥ jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyamapi dauṣṭhulyaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1326:625: phalgugatasyānābhoge nirnimitte sāragatasya tathāgate vihāre prahāṇaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1326:626: sarvāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānatā ca teṣu triṣu vihāreṣu tasya kleśa-jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇasya tadanye vihārā yathānukramaṃ saṃbhārabhūtā bhavanti |
SA20n1326:627: eṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣu samāsata ekādaśavidhā viśuddhirveditavyā |
SA20n1326:635: daśame tattvajñānābhinirhāraviśuddhiḥ ekādaśe tadarthasamyak parasamākhyānāya pratirsavidviśuddhiḥ |
SA20n1326:642: tataścordhvaṃ triṣu bodhisattvavihāreṣu pariśuddhacaryā saṃgṛhīteṣu bhāvanāphalaniṣpattiḥ |
SA20n1326:644: śrāvakavihāre sādharmyeṇa caiṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāmanukramo veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1326:647: yathā tasya nyāmāvakrāntivihāraḥ tathāsya tṛtīyo vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:648: yathā tasyāvetyaprasādalābhinaḥ āryakāntādhiśīlavihāra uttari āsravakṣayāya tathāsya caturtho vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:649: yathā tasyādhiśīlaṃ niśrityādhicittaśikṣānirhāravihāraḥ tathāsya pañcamo vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:650: yathā tasya yathā pratilabdhasatyajñānādhipraśikṣāvihāraḥ tathāsya ṣaṣṭha saptamāṣṭamā vihārā veditavyā |
SA20n1326:651: yathā tasya suvicārita jñeyasyānimittasamādhiprayogavihāraḥ tathāsyanavamo vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:652: yathā tasya pariniṣpanno nirnimitto vihāraḥ tathāsya daśamo vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:653: yathā tasya vyutthitasya vimuktyāyatanavihāraḥ tathāsyaikādaśo vihāraḥ |
SA20n1326:654: yathā tasya sarvākāro'rhatvavihāraḥ tathāsya dvādaśo vihāro veditavyaḥ |
